attributes.action: Raise the Police Recruitment Age to 21 or 25
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think 18 is far too young to be given a position of such responsibility and authority as a police officer. Where is the real life experience. I think it is too easy for virtually anyone to get into the police. I think the entry age should be raised to at least 21 or 25 and the entry exam and academic standards should be toughened up.
